# Darwhin Gomez

**Contact Information**  
Email: [Darwhin88@gmail.com](mailto:Darwhin88@gmail.com)  
Phone: 347-491-2955  
Location: New York, New York  
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)

---

## Summary  
Solutions-focused technologist with experience designing AWS architectures, automated data pipelines, and agentic AI tooling that shortens feedback loops and accelerates application throughput. Passionate about building innovative application experiences and optimizing code for performance.

---

## Education  
**Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning**  
City University of New York – School of Professional Studies  
Expected Jan 2026  
GPA: 4.0, Dean’s List 2x  

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
Jun 2024  
GPA: 3.78, Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

---

## Core Skills  
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL, Java, JavaScript  
- **Mobile Development:** Android SDK, Java  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure  
- **Data Management:** SQL/NoSQL, ETL/ELT, Data Modeling  
- **Software Development:** Agile/Scrum, SDLC, CI/CD  
- **APIs:** REST, FastAPI, Postman  
- **Containerization:** Docker  
- **Version Control:** Git  
- **Soft Skills:** Collaboration, Leadership, Communication  

---

## Experience  
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS), Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS reference architectures for enterprise customers.  
- Built POCs combining Bedrock LLMs with Athena/Glue/Lambda analytics to deliver actionable sentiment insights.  
- Automated a sentiment-analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records and surfaced real-time QuickSight dashboards (5× faster feedback loops).  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by ~5% and reducing toxicity by ~8%.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies, Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems, enhancing user interface and experience.  
- Developed API integration and testing scripts using Postman, ensuring seamless communication between services.  
- Managed relations with 3rd-party vendors to ensure timely delivery of project components.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services, New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts, reducing manual workload and improving efficiency.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access (Active Directory, VPN, VOIP) and delivered white glove support on over 100 tickets.  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U), Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons covering IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners, maintaining a 96% cohort graduation rate.  
- Developed comprehensive testing materials and resources to assess student progress and enhance learning outcomes.  

---

## Projects  
**Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Developed a FastAPI + OpenAI GPT-4 Mini system that automates resume and cover-letter generation with RAG.  
- Integrated GitHub ingestion and job-board APIs for sourcing opportunities, reducing time to apply by 60% and boosting weekly applications by 300%.  

---

## Certifications  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

---

## Interests  
- AI Ethics and Responsible AI  
- NYHackR R based community  
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- Science Fiction Literature  
- Chess, Basketball, Poker
